page.title: 03HAIRSTYLES
page.content: Most{girls}in South Kilworth wear their hair below shoulder length. Some have their hair gathered in pony tails and others wear it loose.{Boys'}hair is generally short, although{mens'} hair is longer than it used to be twenty years ago.{Womens'}hair follows a variety of different styles, it may be permed, dyed or natural. Some{teenagers }have their hair in 'punk' styles. They spray their hair to make it stand up in spiky points. Coloured spray is used by a minority of teenagers. Occasionally young men will shave their heads completely bare, their hairstyle making them members of their particular group.
